languages.text: {n}Щербато осклабившись, рабочий истерично вопит:{/n} "Да, это я все устроил! Я порчу нечистую хотел навести, умертвил товарища в ритуале поганом, с демонами совет водил и сношался! Все чтобы заговор осуществить и Лорд-капитана сгубить во славу моего могучего повелителя". {n}Он заходится истеричным, театрально-зловещим хохотом.{/n}

{n}Gwedon yells, baring what remains of his teeth,{/n} "Yes! It was me! I tried to put a curse on the Lord Captain. I killed my partner in a wicked ritual, rubbed elbows with them daemons, consorted with 'em! All to carry out a dark plot and doom the Lord Captain for the glory of my almighty master." {n}He bursts into a fit of hysterical, theatrical cackling.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Щербато осклабившись, рабочий истерично вопит:{/n} "Да, это я все устроил! Я порчу нечистую хотел навести, умертвил товарища в ритуале поганом, с демонами совет водил и сношался! Все чтобы заговор осуществить и Лорд-капитана сгубить во славу моего могучего повелителя". {n}Он заходится истеричным, театрально-зловещим хохотом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gwedon se met à hurler, dévoilant au passage les rares dents qu'il lui reste :{/n} « Oui ! C'était moi ! J'ai essayé de jeter une malédiction {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. J'ai tué mon partenaire au cours d'un rituel occulte et j'ai pactisé avec les démons pour mener à bien une sombre machination et sacrifier {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à la gloire de mon tout-puissant seigneur et maître, » {n}crache-t-il avant d'être pris d'une crise de fou rire hystérique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gwedon yells, baring what remains of his teeth,{/n} "Yes! It was me! I tried to put a curse on the Lord Captain. I killed my partner in a wicked ritual, rubbed elbows with them daemons, consorted with 'em! All to carry out a dark plot and doom the Lord Captain for the glory of my almighty master." {n}He bursts into a fit of hysterical, theatrical cackling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gwedon se met à hurler, dévoilant au passage les rares dents qu'il lui reste :{/n} « Oui ! C'était moi ! J'ai essayé de jeter une malédiction {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. J'ai tué mon partenaire au cours d'un rituel occulte et j'ai pactisé avec les démons pour mener à bien une sombre machination et sacrifier {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à la gloire de mon tout-puissant seigneur et maître, » {n}crache-t-il avant d'être pris d'une crise de fou rire hystérique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gwedon grita, enseñando los pocos dientes que le quedan.{/n} «¡Sí! ¡He sido yo! He intentado maldecir a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Maté a mi compañero en un ritual perverso, conspiré con esos daemons, ¡confraternicé con ellos! Todo para llevar acabo mi oscuro complot y condenar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán para mayor gloria de mi todopoderoso amo». {n}Estalla en una risotada histérica y teatral.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gwedon yells, baring what remains of his teeth,{/n} "Yes! It was me! I tried to put a curse on the Lord Captain. I killed my partner in a wicked ritual, rubbed elbows with them daemons, consorted with 'em! All to carry out a dark plot and doom the Lord Captain for the glory of my almighty master." {n}He bursts into a fit of hysterical, theatrical cackling.{/n}

Maté a mi compañero en un ritual perverso, conspiré con esos daemons, ¡confraternicé con ellos! Todo para llevar acabo mi oscuro complot y condenar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán para mayor gloria de mi todopoderoso amo». {n}Estalla en una risotada histérica y teatral.{/n}

languages.text: {n}戈登高声叫喊起来，露出残缺不全的牙齿。{/n}“没错！就是我干的！我打算诅咒领主舰长！我在邪恶的仪式上杀害了我的工友，和恶魔厮混在一起，还和她们媾和！我做的一切，都是为了实现邪恶的阴谋，为了杀害领主舰长，为了我全知全能的主人。”{n}他突然爆发出一连串歇斯底里的大笑，笑声充满了戏剧性。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gwedon yells, baring what remains of his teeth,{/n} "Yes! It was me! I tried to put a curse on the Lord Captain. I killed my partner in a wicked ritual, rubbed elbows with them daemons, consorted with 'em! All to carry out a dark plot and doom the Lord Captain for the glory of my almighty master." {n}He bursts into a fit of hysterical, theatrical cackling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}戈登高声叫喊起来，露出残缺不全的牙齿。{/n}“没错！就是我干的！我打算诅咒领主舰长！我在邪恶的仪式上杀害了我的工友，和恶魔厮混在一起，还和她们媾和！我做的一切，都是为了实现邪恶的阴谋，为了杀害领主舰长，为了我全知全能的主人。”{n}他突然爆发出一连串歇斯底里的大笑，笑声充满了戏剧性。{/n}

languages.text: {n}グウェドンは叫び、残っている歯を全てあらわにした。{/n}「そうさ！私だ！ロード・キャプテンを呪おうとした。狂った儀式で相棒を殺し、ディーモンと契約をし、奴等と交わった！全ては暗黒の陰謀を実行し、全能の主人の栄光のためにロード・キャプテンを破滅させたかったのさ」{n}彼はヒステリックに、芝居がかった笑い声を上げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gwedon yells, baring what remains of his teeth,{/n} "Yes! It was me! I tried to put a curse on the Lord Captain. I killed my partner in a wicked ritual, rubbed elbows with them daemons, consorted with 'em! All to carry out a dark plot and doom the Lord Captain for the glory of my almighty master." {n}He bursts into a fit of hysterical, theatrical cackling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グウェドンは叫び、残っている歯を全てあらわにした。{/n}「そうさ！私だ！ロード・キャプテンを呪おうとした。狂った儀式で相棒を殺し、ディーモンと契約をし、奴等と交わった！全ては暗黒の陰謀を実行し、全能の主人の栄光のためにロード・キャプテンを破滅させたかったのさ」{n}彼はヒステリックに、芝居がかった笑い声を上げた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gwedon schreit aus seinem inzwischen fast zahnlosen Mund laut heraus:{/n} "Ja! Ich war es! Ich habe versucht, den Lord Captain mit einem Fluch zu belegen. Ich habe bei einem bösen Ritual meinen Partner getötet, habe mich unter diese Dämonen gemischt, mich mit ihnen verbrüdert! Alles nur, um einen dunklen Plan auszuführen und den Lord Captain zu Ehren meines allmächtigen Meisters dem Untergang zu weihen." {n}Er bricht in hysterisches, theatralisches Gegacker aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gwedon yells, baring what remains of his teeth,{/n} "Yes! It was me! I tried to put a curse on the Lord Captain. All to carry out a dark plot and doom the Lord Captain for the glory of my almighty master." {n}He bursts into a fit of hysterical, theatrical cackling.{/n}

Alles nur, um einen dunklen Plan auszuführen und den Lord Captain zu Ehren meines allmächtigen Meisters dem Untergang zu weihen." {n}Er bricht in hysterisches, theatralisches Gegacker aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gwedon, dişlerinden geri kalanları açığa çıkararak bağırıyor.{/n} "Evet! Ben yaptım! Lord Kaptan'ı lanetlemeye çalıştım. Habis bir ayinde ortağımı öldürdüm, iblislerle karşılaşıp onlara yoldaşlık ettim! Tüm bunları kudretli efendimin şanı için Lord Kaptan'a karanlık bir komplo kurup onu ölüme mahkûm etmek için yaptım." {n}Histerik, âdeta yapmacık bir şekilde kıkırdamaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gwedon yells, baring what remains of his teeth,{/n} "Yes! It was me! I tried to put a curse on the Lord Captain. I killed my partner in a wicked ritual, rubbed elbows with them daemons, consorted with 'em! All to carry out a dark plot and doom the Lord Captain for the glory of my almighty master." {n}He bursts into a fit of hysterical, theatrical cackling.{/n}
